ApplicationReview.name: ApplicationReview
ApplicationReview.description: Represents a review performed against a specified Application.

ApplicationCategory.description: Specifies the category of the application based on the decision period.

ApplicationRecommendation.description: Specifies the reviewer's recommended outcome of the application.

AssignedDate.description: The date when the application was assigned to the reviewer.

AssignedUserId.description: Identifies the user assigned to perform the review.

Comment.description: The information about the review provided on the application.

Condition.description: The condition thatâ€™s applicable to an applicant.

DueDate.description: The last date by which the application review should be completed.

EndDate.description: The date when the application review was completed.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the budget has been submitted. This field is available from API version 59.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the application being reviewed.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who owns the record.

ReviewedById.description: The ID of person who reviewed the application.

StartDate.description: The date when the application review started.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the application review.

SubmissionDate.description: The date when the applicant submitted the application.

Title.description: The detailed name of the preliminary application reference.
